00011 // film.cpp*
00012 #include "film.h"
00013 #include "dynload.h"
00014 #include "paramset.h"
00015 #include "tonemap.h"
00016 // Image Pipeline Function Definitions
00017 void ApplyImagingPipeline(float *rgb, int xResolution,
00018                 int yResolution, float *yWeight,
00019                 float bloomRadius, float bloomWeight,
00020                 const char *toneMapName,
00021                 const ParamSet *toneMapParams,
00022                 float gamma, float dither, int maxDisplayValue) {
00023         int nPix = xResolution * yResolution ;
00024         // Possibly apply bloom effect to image
00025         if (bloomRadius > 0.f && bloomWeight > 0.f) {
00026                 // Compute image-space extent of bloom effect
00027                 int bloomSupport = Float2Int(bloomRadius *
00028                         max(xResolution, yResolution));
00029                 int bloomWidth = bloomSupport / 2;
00030                 // Initialize bloom filter table
00031                 float *bloomFilter = new float[bloomWidth * bloomWidth];
00032                 for (int i = 0; i < bloomWidth * bloomWidth; ++i) {
00033                         float dist = sqrtf(float(i)) / float(bloomWidth);
00034                         bloomFilter[i] = powf(max(0.f, 1.f - dist), 4.f);
00035                 }
00036                 // Apply bloom filter to image pixels
00037                 float *bloomImage = new float[3*nPix];
00038                 ProgressReporter prog(yResolution, "Bloom filter"); //NOBOOK
00039                 for (int y = 0; y < yResolution; ++y) {
00040                         for (int x = 0; x < xResolution; ++x) {
00041                                 // Compute bloom for pixel _(x,y)_
00042                                 // Compute extent of pixels contributing bloom
00043                                 int x0 = max(0, x - bloomWidth);
00044                                 int x1 = min(x + bloomWidth, xResolution - 1);
00045                                 int y0 = max(0, y - bloomWidth);
00046                                 int y1 = min(y + bloomWidth, yResolution - 1);
00047                                 int offset = y * xResolution + x;
00048                                 float sumWt = 0.;
00049                                 for (int by = y0; by <= y1; ++by)
00050                                         for (int bx = x0; bx <= x1; ++bx) {
00051                                                 // Accumulate bloom from pixel $(bx,by)$
00052                                                 int dx = x - bx, dy = y - by;
00053                                                 if (dx == 0 && dy == 0) continue;
00054                                                 int dist2 = dx*dx + dy*dy;
00055                                                 if (dist2 < bloomWidth * bloomWidth) {
00056                                                         int bloomOffset = bx + by * xResolution;
00057                                                         float wt = bloomFilter[dist2];
00058                                                         sumWt += wt;
00059                                                         for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00060                                                                 bloomImage[3*offset+j] += wt * rgb[3*bloomOffset+j];
00061                                                 }
00062                                         }
00063                                 bloomImage[3*offset  ] /= sumWt;
00064                                 bloomImage[3*offset+1] /= sumWt;
00065                                 bloomImage[3*offset+2] /= sumWt;
00066                         }
00067                         prog.Update(); //NOBOOK
00068                 }
00069                 prog.Done(); //NOBOOK
00070                 // Mix bloom effect into each pixel
00071                 for (int i = 0; i < 3 * nPix; ++i)
00072                         rgb[i] = Lerp(bloomWeight, rgb[i], bloomImage[i]);
00073                 // Free memory allocated for bloom effect
00074                 delete[] bloomFilter;
00075                 delete[] bloomImage;
00076         }
00077         // Apply tone reproduction to image
00078         ToneMap *toneMap = NULL;
00079         if (toneMapName)
00080                 toneMap = MakeToneMap(toneMapName,
00081                         toneMapParams ? *toneMapParams : ParamSet());
00082         if (toneMap) {
00083                 float maxDisplayY = 100.f;
00084                 float *scale = new float[nPix], *lum = new float[nPix];
00085                 // Compute pixel luminance values
00086                 float stdYWeight[3] = { 0.212671f, 0.715160f, 0.072169f };
00087                 if (!yWeight) yWeight = stdYWeight;
00088                 for (int i = 0; i < nPix; ++i)
00089                         lum[i] = 683.f * (yWeight[0] * rgb[3*i] +
00090                                 yWeight[1] * rgb[3*i+1] + yWeight[2] * rgb[3*i+2]);
00091                 toneMap->Map(lum, xResolution, yResolution,
00092                         maxDisplayY, scale);
00093                 // Apple scale to pixels for tone mapping and map to $[0,1]$
00094                 float displayTo01 = 683.f / maxDisplayY;
00095                 for (int i = 0; i < xResolution * yResolution; ++i) {
00096                         rgb[3*i  ] *= scale[i] * displayTo01;
00097                         rgb[3*i+1] *= scale[i] * displayTo01;
00098                         rgb[3*i+2] *= scale[i] * displayTo01;
00099                 }
00100                 delete[] scale;
00101                 delete[] lum;
00102         }
00103         // Handle out-of-gamut RGB values
00104         for (int i = 0; i < nPix; ++i) {
00105                 float m = max(rgb[3*i], max(rgb[3*i+1], rgb[3*i+2]));
00106                 if (m > 1.f)
00107                         for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00108                                 rgb[3*i+j] /= m;
00109         }
00110         // Apply gamma correction to image
00111         if (gamma != 1.f) {
00112                 float invGamma = 1.f / gamma;
00113                 for (int i = 0; i < 3*nPix; ++i)
00114                         rgb[i] = powf(rgb[i], invGamma);
00115         }
00116         // Map image to display range
00117         for (int i = 0; i < 3*nPix; ++i)
00118                 rgb[i] *= maxDisplayValue;
00119         // Dither image
00120         if (dither > 0.f)
00121                 for (int i = 0; i < 3*nPix; ++i)
00122                         rgb[i] += 2.f * dither * (RandomFloat() - .5f);
00123 }
